item.description:
Want to have a fun at Friday night? Join us,enjoy singing, dancing and drinking !! learn more Chinese culture, and meet friends. gives everyone an opportunity to come and make new friends, practice their Chinese or English. Bring your friends, and come by, relax, practice in either language of your choice, and enjoy being part of our growing community. we will be there at 8:30pm to 11:30pm ( you also can stay later till they close.)

Would you like to spend a great time with us and your friends?

For drive direction
http://maps.google.co...

For more info.
http://www.yelp.com/b...


People also can attend dinner with us at 6pm event. If interested it, Please RSVP for that event too. Thanks!
item.how_to_find_us: ask front desk where is chinese speaker meetup group.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Friday Karaoke Night!
